p: The prevalence of PDR varied from different regions (TableÂ 3). The overall PDR prevalence for all regions was 6.8% (117/1711). The most severely affected drug class was NNRTI (4.6%, 79/1711), followed by NRTI (2.2%, 38/1711) and PI (0.6%, 10/1711). Liangshan prefecture of Sichuan province had the highest PDR prevalence (12.2%, 34/279) among all regions, followed by Dehong prefecture (9.3%, 14/150) and Lincang prefecture (8.9%, 14/158) of Yunnan province.
